alert.note: Alert for Logan; Montgomery; Scott; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 7:11PM CDT until May 19 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Logan County in western Arkansas... Eastern Scott County in western Arkansas... Southwestern Yell County in central Arkansas... North central Montgomery County in western Arkansas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 711 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Booneville to near Cardiff to near Waldron, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Booneville... Waldron... Danville... Magazine... Blue Mountain... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Cardiff... Gravelly... Fourche Valley... Muddy Creek WMA... Belleville... Havana... Corinth... Ranger... Wing... Olio... Bluffton... Rover... Boles... Grayson... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
